name: Professional Fireball training Causeway Simulator 2021
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

READ THE GAME RULES on the title screen to understand the dangers of the causeway.

then.. and only then..

Simply tap the bottom of the screen to issue fireballs toward the oncoming hordes.. Good Luck!

This is a port of an Android game, If it doesnt run smoothly in your browser it is available for free on Google Play.

Pro Fireball Causeway Training Simulator by Argondevil Guiderods
refine your fireball skills using a quite silly simulated and ever changing causeway
More Music, Stats, Causeways and characters to come in 2021
User feedback will be closely listened to and implemented in updates
Music by Solomon Haunt and Argondevil Guiderods.
Sprites created using the excellent Open Art Sprite Generator by gaurav.munja which uses free to use elements from the Liberated Pixel Cup competition June 2012 as featured on the OpenGameArt website.
